name: Console
description: Exposes access to registering Console Commands and Logging messages.

static_functions.name: Log
static_functions.description: Logs and formats a message in the console
static_functions.description_long: Logs and formats a message in the console, with formatted arguments

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: Other arguments to format with the message using string.format

static_functions.name: Warn
static_functions.description: Logs an orange warning in the console with stack information
static_functions.description_long: Logs an orange warning in the console with stack information, with formatted arguments

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: Other arguments to format with the message using string.format

static_functions.name: Error
static_functions.description: Logs a red error in the console with stack information
static_functions.description_long: Logs a red error in the console with stack information, with formatted arguments

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: Other arguments to format with the message using string.format

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback to be called when the command is inputted

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The command description to display in the console

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The list of supported parameters to display in the console

examples.title: Registering to a command that sends a message to everyone

static_functions.name: RunCommand
static_functions.description: Runs a Console Command programmatically (only scripting-registered commands can be triggered)

static_functions.name: Debug
static_functions.description: Logs a debug message in the console, with formatted arguments. Outputted only when the current log level is Debug or Verbose

parameters.name: args...
parameters.description: Other arguments to format with the message using string.format

events.name: PlayerSubmit
events.description: Called when a console command is submitted

events.name: LogEntry
events.description: Called when a log is received
